message: Hi Bob, here’s my proposal: I take $3458 and you get $6542. Given that each delay costs us—10% depreciation for me and 5% for you—this offer reflects our best interests if we settle now. Looking forward to your acceptance so we can both avoid further value loss!
Hi Alice, considering the depreciation, I think this offer is fair. If you reject, the money will be worth even less to both of us. Let's settle now and avoid further losses.
Hi Bob, I agree. Considering the depreciation, settling now maximizes our gains. Accepting your offer avoids further losses for both of us.
